ability.name: You're Driving Me Crazy
ability.description: * Take 1 Corruption Point to activate You're Driving Me Crazy. * While You're Driving Me Crazy is active, every time you cause all Adversaries to redraw their Intent, you may also force one Adversary to discard their Intent entirely. * An Adversary with no Intent will not perform an action this turn.
ability.flavor: You're such a spectacle that even your foes can't help but watch.
